posts.post_content:
I'm looking to swing an Olde Fashioned baseball card trade.

Here is what I'm looking for:
Polar Bear backs
- Adkins
- Beckley
- Demmitt
- Gandil
- Kelley
- McGraw (hip)
- Tinker (bat on/bat off)
Green Cobb

I only want graded, no raw please.
Looking for low grade, 1-2 range.

In addition to the attached pics, I have other big name HOFers available (think Cobb(Red PB back, Bat off PB back), Johnson(t206 Port, t205)), as well as the ability to include dead presidents...
